long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tabular is a browser extension for people who always have a lot of tabs open.

  - Click the button to see a list of all your open tabs in one easy-to-read table.
  - Sort and search to find the tabs you're looking for.
  - Use the "Bookmark" and "Close" buttons to organize and clean up your open tabs.

Tame your tabs with Tabular!
